interpretation: The wavy dash card represents a sense of ambiguity and unpredictability. Its fluctuating nature implies that things may not always be what they seem. It reminds us that life is full of surprises, and we must be prepared to adapt to changing circumstances. This card is a reminder to remain flexible and open-minded, as things may not always go as planned. It can also indicate a need to be cautious in decision-making, as there may be hidden factors at play. This card encourages you to trust your instincts and remain aware of your surroundings, as the situation may be more complex than it appears on the surface. The wavy dash is a reminder that life is full of twists and turns, and we must be prepared for the unexpected.
